title: Was ‘Amazing Grace’ Penned By a Repentant Slave Trader?
subtitle: The inspiration for this well-known piece of sacred music purportedly struck after a life-altering brush with death at sea.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Having survived a horrific storm, a slave trader promptly gave up his livelihood, became a Christian, and penned the hymn 'Amazing Grace' in thanksgiving.
